definition: to ask oneself honestly/to search in one's heart

sentences.english: I remembered my songs in the night.
sentences.chinese: 我想起我夜间的歌曲，扪心自问。

sentences.english: Continue to ask yourself hard questions about the nature of work.
sentences.chinese: 请继续扪心自问，关于工作的本质意义问题。

sentences.english: Ask if the criticism is helpful.
sentences.chinese: 扪心自问，这批评是对的吗？

sentences.english: The wrinkled postcard now made me reconsider .
sentences.chinese: 此刻这张打皱的明信片却促我重新扪心自问。

sentences.english: Banging your heart against some mad bugger's wall.
sentences.chinese: 面对那些疯子的墙时，请扪心自问。

sentences.english: Just ask ourselves whether we really deserve the pay we receive.
sentences.chinese: 扪心自问，我们对得起这份收入吗？

sentences.english: Sir, ask yourself, what will Jesus do?
sentences.chinese: 老师，请扪心自问，耶稣会怎么做？

sentences.english: "But we may now ask ourselves, how long can this party last?
sentences.chinese: 但是，现在我们必须扪心自问，这个派对能继续多久？

sentences.english: Continue to ask yourself hard questions about the nature of work.
sentences.chinese: 请继续扪心自问，关于工作的本质意义问题。

sentences.english: Ask yourself are you not moths as well?
sentences.chinese: 扪心自问难道你们不一样是投火的飞蛾么？

sentences.english: This is what we should always ask ourselves topic.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们应该经常扪心自问的话题。

sentences.english: The questions you have to ask yourself don't end there.
sentences.chinese: 你需要扪心自问的问题还不止这些？

definition: to ask oneself/to search one's soul/to reach a conclusion after weighing a matter
I would like to ask (usually used rhetorically)/one might well ask
to think back over sth/to review/to revisit/to rethink/reflection/reassessment
to examine oneself/to reflect on one's shortcomings/introspection/self-awareness/self-criticism
lit. look into one's heart, no shame (idiom); with a clear conscience
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
to put oneself in sb else's shoes
not to let sb down/to treat sb fairly/be worthy of
